reviews.review: Viciante, otimo para jogar com amigos :)

Infelizmente na atual condição e desde que esse "GAME" nasceu.
Não recomendo porque? Foi feito simplesmente pra te sugar toda a sua grana,feito com o rabo literalmente.
Espero que mais pra frente possa melhorar,que no caso duvido é muito.
Cheio de BUGS que em qualquer outro game os fãs desse mesmo estariam matando e xingando mas,DBD e uma obra prima aos olhos deles.Pra você ter uma noção tem um BUG que os proprios players utilizam para andar o famoso "MOONWALK"
mas que eles acham super normal.Enfim gaste seu suor e sua grana em algo que preste ou jogue apenas por jogar,não leve esse "GAME" a sério.

me gusta el juego es bastante divertido solo y con amigos, aunque jugando solo suele ser agobiante y estresante dependiendo del killer y survivor, si tienes un equipo bueno o amigos para jugar puede ser muy divertido aun que el mayor problema esta en algunos mapas que son muy cerrados (el mapa del demogorgon) y que algunos killers son increiblemente op he jugado algunas partidas que han durado segundos por culpa de estos problemas pero en resumen es divertido con amigos y sin amigos es disfrutable
the gaming is Scary and the woman axe Throw Dead by daylight and the win
jogo sem graça pra quem joga de surv
Zatím mám pouze 18h, ale je to zatím super

El Juego es recomendado, totalmente, Lo que si deberían crear un Matchmaking para los jugadores de Pc y Otro (Encarecidamente) Para los de PlayStation y Xbox (Desconozco si está). Después lo demás, todo perfecto.

I have never really played "computer" games before- at least not like this game. This game is SUPER fun and easy to learn, even though I am still very new at it, it's easy to pick up and continue to get better!
much better then i thought it would be. fun way to kill time with friends

Infelizmente o jogo não é ok! Se vc deseja passar raiva com lags inexplicáveis ou desconexões em meio a partidas sem falar da demora para fechar uma partida e dos bugs que nunca são arrumados em updates compre!
I only play this game for man ass.

Я правда не понимаю, почему я не могу купить пятна крови? Если он находится в определенной стране / регионе, обмен денег на пятна крови возможен. Экран игры теперь немного отстает. Если вы сможете разработать версию следующего поколения и добавить красивых женских персонажей, будет ли продаваться больше DLC? Повышение уровня и получение очков крови настолько скучно и утомительно, что я хочу как можно скорее достичь уровня этой роли и весело играть с друзьями, вместо того, чтобы меня целый день использовали высокоуровневые и опытные противники!

mi pc no lo corre pero mi plei si :) y de todas mis horas que he jugado en play aprox 1500+ puedo decir que es un juegazo, tiene sus bugs horrendos y sus bugs divertidos xd y tambien posiblemente una de las comunidades mas toxicas, con killers re camperos, tunneleros, y k traen pvta noed. pero de igual forma se disfruta mucho el juego, es posiblemente uno de los juegos que aunque talvez no te guste mucho su genero, de igual forma te volveras adicto a el xd(aqui esta uno de ellos)

Very fun game, I love playing this with friends. After a while you tend not to get scared of the killer as much, however i've played this game for roughly 3000 on ps4 and I can for sure tell you that ghostface and micheal always scare me :'D
es un  gran juego, lo recomiendo mucho.

This game is great and the devs actually listen to the community on a lot of stuff. Great game overall

Edited (5/14/2021)- This game is a 4 Vs 1 multiplayer game where 4 survivors have to attempt to complete actions on a variety of different maps while being hunted by another player who is the killer. There are several options to choose from for different killers and survivors all with their own special abilities and perks. It is worth it to at least give the game a try, and you can purchase DLCs which contain different killers and survivors that you can use. Some are worth it and others are not really worth it depending on your play style. 

The ranking system in this game is somewhat odd compared to other games. You have your total "player level" which goes from 1-100 and then you have different ranks for your killers vs survivors. Your Killers/Suvivors rank starts at rank 20 and works it way down from there. With Rank 1 being the top rank you can achieve as either killer or survivor. You can choose to main as killer or survivor or you can do a mix of both. I do a mix of both survivor and killer, but lately I do tend to play Killer more often. 

The Survivor/Killer ranks reset every month on the 13th which means you move down a few levels every month and have to work your way back up. Many tend to avoid the game during the week following reset as many of the players tend to get "sweaty" during this time. 

Overall I enjoy the game and I do recommend it. It does have it's fair share of glitches and bugs but the devs do their best to take care of things in a timely manner most of the time.
Muy entretenido para jugar con amigos

Most things I can understand why they're popular but this? It's fundamentally flawed and I have no idea why people play it. For anyone unfamiliar with it, it's an asymmetrical multiplayer horror game where 4 players try to avoid a horror killer like Freddy Kruger or Michael Meyers while repairing generators to open two doors on the side of the map and escape the killer.

Problem is, people treat the slasher like he's a joke because it's trivial to outrun one and kite them using static props that can't be destroyed. The killer walks slightly faster than the survivors so assuming you really stay on their ass, you might be able to walk around a set of cars six times and manage to catch up. That gets you a hit, it takes two to down a character. Meanwhile a team with a couple repair kits which veteran players hoard can end the game in less than seven minutes.

Assuming the killer actually manages to get a survivor despite kiting around static props and dropping wooden palettes that slow the killer down even more, you carry their injuried body to a hook and it takes about a minute for them to be "consumed by the depths" and die. During this time, other players can unhook them and rehooking the same player reduces that time and a third rehook kills them instantly.

So just to be clear, a killer either has to camp the body and use 1/7th of the entire match to confirm a kill or "kill" the same person three times, hook them over and over again until it's an instakill or hope that the other survivors are completely incompetent?

Once all the generators are repaired, two exits are accessible on opposite sides of the map. Players have to repair one of the two boxes to open the gate which takes 15-20 seconds and then survivors can walk through the gate and escape. This is where you might get lucky and manage to snag a single survivor if they're not communicating that they're using exit #2 instead of #1.

I've been told there are killers that have some skills that somewhat mitigate some of the kiting issues but they're all locked behind DLC (about $75 worth of playable killers locked behind microtransactions at the moment)

tl;dr - game sucks, Laurie Strode should've just ran around a pile of boxes until Michael Meyers got tired of hunting her like I just did.
Toxic people warning but other then that, great!

Про нормальный подбор игроков в этой помойке не слышали

Во время игры за выжившего на высоких рангах, тебе либо подбирает полных идиотов, которые намеренно руинят тебе катку (лишь бы побольше очков крови содрать), или тех, кто только открыл игру и вообще не втупляет, что тут делать

Но если ты решил сыграть за убийцу, то тебе будут кидать людей на несколько рангов выше: играешь на 2 пепле? Держи 3 золото! Только дошел до 4 серебра? Держи 2 радужный 

И все бы ничего, если бы это было не постоянно, да вот только это происходит каждую вторую игру

UPD: Чем больше играешь в эту помойку, тем больше и больше минусов находишь.
 
Игра и так сделана чисто для сурвов, так еще и античит тут работает через отверстие негра (собственно как и подбор) В этот высер и так почти невозможно нормально отыграть за мана (т.к. почти всех порезали, ибо выжившим же сложна) Так еще и читаки сурвы ставят свою жирную точку на хоть какие либо шансы позитивного восприятия этой помойки
A nice game to play with friends and alone. Behavior could fix some (many) bugs tho
Great game to play with friends and have a laugh

Hola necesito ayuda porque yo juego muchisimo a este juego y me gustaria que alguien me de una solucion a mi problema . Con el juego en estos dias me venia andando bien pero hoy que queria jugar me aparece un error que no se que es . Dice asi DX11 feature level 11.0 is required to run the engine . Yo nunca tuve problemas con el juego en cuanto a los graficos y los requiesitos pero ahora me aparece esto porfavor si alguien me puede ayudar , yo juego mucho este juego y no me gustaria dejarlo de jugar por un simple error

0/10 will put hundreds more hours into this game.

Ich finde das Spiel gut, super toll, ABER was ist das für ein Matchmaking? Allein auf Steam spielen im Schnitt 50.000 Leute ohne Job und Seele dieses Spiel und trotzdem dauert es 5 Minuten, um mich hier in einen Squad zu klatschen. Das schränkt meine Lebensqualität enorm ein und ich möchte dringend mit einem Manager sprechen.
I love this game! I do wish they would stop only having killer daily challenges. I only play survivor and I have very few daily challenges that are for survivors.
